verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Teach me that my life is not my own
Teach me that my life does not belong to me
Teach me how to yield to You my selfish control
Teach me how to live with those around me
Teach me how to die to
All that I think's best for me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are Lord, You are my saviour
I am Yours, I am Your servant
You are Lord, and I must follow You
Wherever You choose to lead me
My life is not my own, my Lord, it's Yours
